column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What not to see: Many elements of the Edlis collection
column2: especially the works by Koons and Hirst. All ego from the artists
column4: and collectors convincing themselves that this stuff is important. Sorry for the cliche
column5: but the emperor wears no clothes. (That being said
column6: the Lichtenstein and Twombly in their collection are both incredible so I'm not a total hater).
